CatalogUnitDTO.title: CatalogUnitDTO

custom.description: is unit a custom company unit (if not, it's a system unit)

scope.description: scope, one of: s - service, p - product, a - all

CatalogUnitDTO.description:
System Units

14  -         All
17  Credit    All
13  Flat      All
7  Item      Product
9  Litres    Product
16  Metres    Product
15  Minutes   All
8  kg        Product
12  km        All
10  m2        Product
11  m3        Product

ContactAccountDTO.title: ContactAccountDTO

defaultAccount.description: whether it is a default contact's account ,

number.description: IBAN or ISR number (depends on the type)

ContactAccountDTO.description: Bank or Postfinance account of the Contact

defaultAddress.description: whether it is a default contact's address

defaultPrepage.description: whether the address is a default postal address

hideOnDocuments.description: whether to hide this address on documents

communicationChannel.description: possible values: U - No preference, E - Documents by e-mail, P - Documents by post

communicationNewsletter.description: possible values: A - Send to main e-mail address and contacts, M - Only send to main e-mail address, N - No newsletter wanted

discountType.description: default discount type; possible values P - in %, A - Amount

gender.description: gender of contact (required for P type); possible values: M - Male, F - Female, O - Other

genderSalutationActive.description: whether to show Mr./Ms. before contact name (for P type only)

hobbies.description: hobbies and activities in free time

nameAddition.description: additional text for contact name (maiden name)

type.description: type of contact; possible values: C - Company, P - Private

ContactGroupDTO.title: ContactGroupDTO

usage.description: how many contacts are assigned to this group ,

ContactGroupDTO.description: The group a contact belongs to

defaultPerson.description: whether it is a default contact's person

gender.description: gender of contact (required for P type); possible values: M - Male, F - Female, O - Other

showTitle.description: whether to show Mr/Ms before name

wantsNewsletter.description: whether person wishes to receive newsletter

contactRelationType.description: type of contact's relation; possible values: type of contact's relation; possible values: CL - Customer, CR - Creditor, TE - TEAM, OF - Authorities (Behrden), ME - Medical, OT - Others

dateTime.description: date and time of event that should be reminded (format: IOS8601) ,

intervalValue.description: value of interval in which reminder will be activated , /

domainArea.description: the custom field if for the domain resource

key.description: the key to identify the custom field

name.description: a name which appears on the dialog

key.description: the key to identify the custom field

name.description: a name which appears on the dialog

discountType.description: optional discount type; possible values: A - amount, P - in %

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageAmount.description: how many pages the document has

status.description: status of delivery note, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, B - billed, D - deleted (but still visible)

total.description: total amount of the delivery note

vatIncluded.description: whether prices in delivery note include VAT

fontSize.description: font size of displayed text (min: 1; max: 50)

pageNo.description: which page text is displayed on

positionX.description: The x position of the free text

positionY.description: The y position of the free text

DocumentInvoiceWorkflowDTO.title: DocumentInvoiceWorkflowDTO

action.description: action that should be taken; possible values: M - remind me, CE - remind contact by email, CP - remind contact by post

contactEmail.description: email address for reminding contact (valid only when action is CE)

overdueDays.description: how many days after due date action should be taken ,

speed.description: post speed for reminding contact (valid only when action is CP); possible values: P - priority, E - economy

status.description: status of a document that the workflow is for; possible values: R - payment reminder, R1 - 1st reminder, R2 - 2nd reminder, R3 - 3rd reminder

DocumentInvoiceWorkflowDTO.description: Defining the workflow of the invoice with  R - payment reminder, R1 - 1st reminder, R2 - 2nd reminder, R3 - 3rd reminder

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageAmount.description: how many pages the document has

status.description: status of letter, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, D - deleted (but still visible)

catalogType.description: position catalog type; possible values: P - product, S - service

discountType.description: optional discount type; possible values:A - amount, P - percentage

price.description: price per unit; required for N type

showOnlyTotal.description: whether to show only total on invoice

type.description: position type; possible values: N - normal, T - text, PB - page break, H - header, SI - subtotal (incremental), SNI - subtotal (non incremental)

vat.description: VAT rate; required for N type

documentType.description: which Receivable document is the information for; possible values: O - Offer, C - Order Confirmation, D - Delivery Note, I - Invoice

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

type.description: which document type is the condition for; possible values: D - Document, E- Email

usage.description: At which document position shall the text be used; possible values; T - Title, I - Introduction, D - Condition

entityType.description: type of assigned entity, one of: P - project, CU - cost unit, C - contact

isInvoiced.description: if effort has been invoiced already

currencyFrom.description: ISO currency name we are setting exchange from

currencyTo.description: ISO currency name we are setting exchange to

fontSize.description: font size of displayed text (min: 1; max: 50)

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageNo.description: which page text is displayed on

positionX.description: The x position of the free text

positionY.description: The y position of the free text

discountType.description: optional discount type; possible values: A - amount, P - in %

isrPosition.description: ISR position; possible values: A - additional page, F - first page, L - last page

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageAmount.description: how many pages the document has

paidDate.description: date when invoice was fully paid

paymentLinkPaypal.description: whether to print PayPal link on invoice

paymentLinkPayrexx.description: whether to print Payrexx link on invoice

paymentLinkPostfinance.description: whether to print PostFinance link on invoice

paymentLinkSmartcommerce.description: whether to print SmartCommerce link on invoice

status.description:
status of invoice, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, P - paid,
PP - partially paid, R1 - 1st reminder, R2 - 2nd reminder, R3 - 3rd reminder,
R - reminder, DC - debt collection, C - cancelled, D - deleted (but still visible)

total.description: total amount of the delivery note

vatIncluded.description: whether prices in delivery note include VAT

IsrDTO.title: IsrDTO

defaultIsr.description: whether ISR is a default one

name.description: optional ISR name (for internal system use only)

position.description: ISR position; possible values: A - additional page, F - first page, L - last page

type.description: SR type; possible values: ISR - orange inpayment slip, ISR+ - orange inpayment slip plus, RIS - red inpayment slip, QR Code and QR Code with reference

IsrDTO.description: ISR definition for ISR - orange inpayment slip, ISR+ - orange inpayment slip plus, RIS - red inpayment slip, QR Code and QR Code with reference

acceptOnline.description: whether offer can be accepted online

acceptOnlineStatus.description: status of offer's acceptance; possible values: A - accepted, D - declined, U - unknown

acceptOnlineUrl.description: generated URL for accepting the offer online

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageAmount.description: how many pages the document has

status.description: status of offer, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, DE - declined, A - accepted, B - billed, D - deleted (but still visible)

total.description: total amount of the delivery note

validUntil.description: date that offer is valid until

vatIncluded.description: whether prices in delivery note include VAT

language.description: language; possible values: de, en, es, fr, it ,

pageAmount.description: how many pages the document has

status.description: status of order confirmation, possible values: DR - draft, S - sent, B - billed, D - deleted (but still visible)

total.description: total amount of the delivery note

vatIncluded.description: whether prices in delivery note include VAT

PermissionDTO.description: actions that can be performed on an item (possible values: view, edit)

status.description: status to be set, on of:  ''O'' - open, ''C'' - closed, ''B'' - billed, ''P'' - pending'

useServicePrice.description: use price defined in service catalog

add.description: the use can add a new resource

domainArea.description: the permission is for the domain resource

edit.description: the use can edit a resource

manage.description: the use can manage a resource

ResourcePermissionDTO.description: actions that can be performed on an item (possible values: view, edit, manage) for own or all

userName.description: the user name of this signature

created.description: date when working hours entity was created

date.description: date of working hours time span

timeEnd.description: end of working hours time span (in HH:MM format)

timeStart.description: start of working hours time span (in HH:MM format)
